snippet.title: Aftermath 1945 - Landscape Demo Showcase
snippet.description:
Note: Aftermath 1945's development has been put on the shelf due to the cancellation of investors. Aftermath 1945 would require many mechanics and a large amount of art assets that personal funding would not deliver in at least 3-4 years. Due to this, we have resulted towards a title that is more minimal and fund friendly to our funding rate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you would like to stay up to date with our development for our new title, visit us at https://wardb.com and/or dive into our community at https://discord.gg/wtFKegg.

Video showcasing a landscape by Maverick for Aftermath 1945.

Read more and support our development at https://wardb.com/aftermath1945.
